mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clubs ( club_name, creator, city, created_at ) VALUES ( #{clubName}, #{creator}, #{city}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO club_members ( club_id, user_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO club_members ( club_id, user_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{clubId}, #{userId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.club_name AS clubName, c.creator, u.username AS creatorName, c.city, ci.city AS cityName, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM clubs c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.creator = u.id LEFT JOIN cities ci ON c.city = ci.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
